summary: TL*THE CONTACT OWNS A FABRIQUE-PAR MARINE MASTER TRAILER, MODEL S-1921-3625 (NA).  ONCE THE CONTACT ARRIVED HOME, HE NOTICED THAT THE METAL GUIDE BOARD WAS DETACHED FROM THE TRAILER.  IT WAS ALMOST AS IF SOMEONE CUT THE METAL WITH A KNIFE.  HE STATED THAT IF THE METAL HAD BLOWN OFF THE TRAILER WHILE IT WAS IN MOTION, IT WOULD HAVE CAUSED A CATASTROPHIC CRASH.  THE MANUFACTURER STATED THAT THEY WERE AWARE OF THE FAILURE AND THE METAL WAS DEFECTIVE.  THEY FURTHER STATED THAT THEY WOULD REPLACE THE METAL FOR FREE.    UPDATED 5/5/09 *CN  UPDATED 05/06/09.*JB

WAS PULLING A 2008 MUSTANG HORSE TRAILER WHEN THE ELECTRIC BRAKE CONNECTION  FAILED.  WHEN I PROCEEDED TO TAKE THE TRAILER IN TO BE CHECKED AT A LOCAL AUTOMOTIVE  SHOP, I WAS ALERTED THAT 2 OF THE LEAF SPRING BOLTS HAD WORKED LOOSE.  THIS COULD  HAVE CAUSED THE TRAILER TO FALL OFF THE AXLE. *TR
